Introduction

ABRY (short for All Been ReadY) is a female duo under withHC. Originally a four-member group, they debuted on November 15, 2017, with the digital single "The Dream of Ugly Duckling". On February 14, 2019, it was announced that Yeji left for personal reasons. Soeun left sometime in October 2020 after her profile info was removed following an update to the group's artist page on withHC's website.
